nodes.body:
This is a guide to various types of digital tools, systems, and approaches with an emphasis on educational uses and relevance. The categories and subcategories to the right are described, and also provide lists of specific tools that allow you to accomplish the functdions in question.

Click on a + sign to see the divisions of any given category. Each category and subcategory can be described, such that it  provides a curated guide to educational technologies. This typology  is used to index descriptions of individual tools by type in SHANTI's socially networked tools directory. This then allows users to browse through categories of tools and see a list of tools corresponding to each category.

Please send suggestions of any type to SHANTI, or if you want to help directly, contact us.
